document_data.caption: A rickshaw travels hurriedly down city streets on the Rock of Bral
document_data.name: Rickshaw
document_data.mainbody: '''Rickshaws''', known as '''trotting carts''' in [[Waterdeep]], were a type of [[carriage]] used to transport people in urban areas.
document_data.Description: Rickshaws had two wheels and were capable of carrying up to two people comfortably. Rather than any animal, rickshaws were pulled by one or two people.

Notable Users of Rickshaws.Individuals: In the [[Xiousing]] district of [[Marsember]], a man named [[Shiau Chen]] operated a rickshaw business out of the [[Lily Pad Inn]].{{Cite dungeon/195/Backdrop: Xiousing}}
Notable Users of Rickshaws.Groups: The [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Fellowship of Carters and Coachmen]] operated rickshaws throughout the city of Waterdeep. They charged people a single [[copper piece]]
Notable Users of Rickshaws.Regions & Settlements:
* On the [[Rock of Bral]], rickshaws were one of the ways that people got around the [[Bral|city]]. The operators of these rickshaws charged passengers a [[silver piece]].<ref>
* Rickshaws could be seen in use in some parts of [[Shou Lung]].<ref>
